title: When It Comes To Exercise, "All Movement Counts"
description: Feeling blocked with it comes to starting an exercise habit? You can actually get the health benefits of exercise with just 22 minutes of exercise a day — and you might be surprised what "counts" as exercise. Kiss your excuses goodbye!

itunes:summary: Life Kit shares 4 tips that will help you to start exercising.
